name: Parkguin
description:
Reach the flag that is on top of the hill as you pass through challenging platforms. Unfortunately, you are a water-allergic penguin, so if you touch it, you drown. Try not to lose, Okay?

IMPORTANT: This game was made in the game jam My First Game Jam: Summer 2018 in two weeks by someone who had no experience with 3D, so it has many bugs. I'll probably fix it later, when I have more experience :)

Please do not leave without commenting on what you think of the game :)

GLES 3.0 required
